Name: Lavender Martini
Ingredients: 75 ml Ketel One Vodka infused with lavender
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Infusing lavender in liquor tends to make it bitter but the Parfait Amour adds sweetness as well as flavour and colour.
Nutrition: One serving of Lavender Martini contains 228 calories
